description: Returns the current status of a resource operation request. For more information, see Tracking the progress of resource operation requests in the Amazon Web Services Cloud Control API User Guide.

parameters.name: RequestToken
parameters.description: A unique token used to track the progress of the resource operation request. Request tokens are included in the ProgressEvent type returned by a resource operation request.

nested_items.name: ProgressEvent
nested_items.description: Represents the current status of the resource operation request.

nested_items.name: TypeName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource type used in the operation.

nested_items.name: Identifier
nested_items.description: The primary identifier for the resource.

nested_items.name: RequestToken
nested_items.description: The unique token representing this resource operation request.

nested_items.name: HooksRequestToken
nested_items.description: The unique token representing the Hooks operation for the request.

nested_items.name: Operation
nested_items.description: The resource operation type.

nested_items.name: OperationStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the resource operation request.
PENDING: The resource operation hasn't yet started.
IN_PROGRESS: The resource operation is currently in progress.
SUCCESS: The resource operation has successfully completed.
FAILED: The resource operation has failed. Refer to the error code and status message for more information.
CANCEL_IN_PROGRESS: The resource operation is in the process of being canceled.
CANCEL_COMPLETE: The resource operation has been canceled.

nested_items.name: EventTime
nested_items.description: When the resource operation request was initiated.

nested_items.name: ResourceModel
nested_items.description: A JSON string containing the resource model, consisting of each resource property and its current value.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: Any message explaining the current status.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: For requests with a status of FAILED, the associated error code.

nested_items.name: RetryAfter
nested_items.description: When to next request the status of this resource operation request.

nested_items.name: HooksProgressEvent
nested_items.description: Lists Hook invocations for the specified target in the request. This is a list since the same target can invoke multiple Hooks.

nested_items.name: HookTypeName
nested_items.description: The type name of the Hook being invoked.

nested_items.name: HookTypeVersionId
nested_items.description: The type version of the Hook being invoked.

nested_items.name: HookTypeArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Hook being invoked.

nested_items.name: InvocationPoint
nested_items.description: States whether the Hook is invoked before or after resource provisioning.

nested_items.name: HookStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the Hook invocation. The following are potential statuses:
HOOK_PENDING: The Hook was added to the invocation plan, but not yet invoked.
HOOK_IN_PROGRESS: The Hook was invoked, but hasn't completed.
HOOK_COMPLETE_SUCCEEDED: The Hook invocation is complete with a successful result.
HOOK_COMPLETE_FAILED: The Hook invocation is complete with a failed result.
HOOK_FAILED: The Hook invocation didn't complete successfully.

nested_items.name: HookEventTime
nested_items.description: The time that the Hook invocation request initiated.

nested_items.name: HookStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The message explaining the current Hook status.

nested_items.name: FailureMode
nested_items.description: The failure mode of the invocation. The following are the potential statuses:
FAIL: This will fail the Hook invocation and the request associated with it.
WARN: This will fail the Hook invocation, but not the request associated with it.
